Sentencas: A novel tri-generation system of power, heating, and freshwater is developed in this study.
Titulo: An integrated sustainable system fueled by Co-Combustion of legume straw biomass and synthesis gas of SOFC: Optimization study using Signal-To-Noise ratio analysis

Sentencas: The system integrates of a supercritical CO2 Brayton cycle, a solid oxide fuel cell, and a desalination system of humidification -dehumidification type.
Titulo: An integrated sustainable system fueled by Co-Combustion of legume straw biomass and synthesis gas of SOFC: Optimization study using Signal-To-Noise ratio analysis

Sentencas: The system is fueled by a combustion of the synthesis gases of the solid oxide fuel cell helping by a legume straw biomass flow.
Titulo: An integrated sustainable system fueled by Co-Combustion of legume straw biomass and synthesis gas of SOFC: Optimization study using Signal-To-Noise ratio analysis

Sentencas: The heat is recovered from the combusted gases and triggers the su-percritical CO2 Brayton cycle and the desalination system.
Titulo: An integrated sustainable system fueled by Co-Combustion of legume straw biomass and synthesis gas of SOFC: Optimization study using Signal-To-Noise ratio analysis

Sentencas: The key variables of the solid oxide fuel cell are evaluated and their influences on the voltages are examined in details.
Titulo: An integrated sustainable system fueled by Co-Combustion of legume straw biomass and synthesis gas of SOFC: Optimization study using Signal-To-Noise ratio analysis

Sentencas: They are optimized using Taguchi approach and signal-to-noise ratio analysis to achieve the maximum solid oxide fuel cell power.
Titulo: An integrated sustainable system fueled by Co-Combustion of legume straw biomass and synthesis gas of SOFC: Optimization study using Signal-To-Noise ratio analysis

Sentencas: Current density of 9375 A/m2, utilization factor of 0.7, temperature of 900 K, steam to carbon ratio of 2, anode recycling co-efficient and cathode recycling coefficient of 0 are recognized to be the optimal conditions.
Titulo: An integrated sustainable system fueled by Co-Combustion of legume straw biomass and synthesis gas of SOFC: Optimization study using Signal-To-Noise ratio analysis

Sentencas: The fuel cell power is 625.3 kW in this optimal state.
Titulo: An integrated sustainable system fueled by Co-Combustion of legume straw biomass and synthesis gas of SOFC: Optimization study using Signal-To-Noise ratio analysis

Sentencas: The system provides 674.6 kW of net power, 157.3 g/h of mass flow rate of freshwater and 13812 kg/h of mass flow rate of hot water in its optimum condition.
Titulo: An integrated sustainable system fueled by Co-Combustion of legume straw biomass and synthesis gas of SOFC: Optimization study using Signal-To-Noise ratio analysis
